title: can someone please tell me..
body: how am i supposed to fight twitch when he pops out of stealth standing 20 feet away from me and 3 shotting me with his attack speed buff, ult and poision before i even have to to react and run or try to get in range to fight him? where is his counterplay? and dont say wards because how am i supposed to know when hes near me or not when his detection radius is smaller than his ult range? which he pops as soon as he exits stealth, so i literally have no reaction time to do anything against him, same goes for my team who were more squishy than me.
